code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getGalleryCatalogsByID}from'../../api/api';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{useScrollToTop}from'../../hooks/scrollToTop';import GoBackButton from'../../components/UI/GoBackButton/GoBackButton';import FilesList from'../../components/FilesList/FilesList';import FilesFilter from'../../components/FilesFilter/FilesFilter';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GallerySeparatePage=()=>{useScrollToTop();let{Id}=useParams();let[data,setData]=useState({});let[isFilterParametr,setFilterParametr]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{Id&&getGalleryCatalogsByID(Id,isFilterParametr).then(response=>setData(...response));},[Id,isFilterParametr]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GoBackButton,{toLink:"/gallery"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilesFilter,{changeFilter:setFilterParametr}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FilesList,{data:data.files}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"modal window"})})]});};export default GallerySeparatePage;
